resources.string: We haven\'t any provision of recover password so, please make it carefully.
Please Install Notes, It Is Awesome

This application is for creating notes with title. In this application there are two type of notes. 
1. Public. 
2. Private. 
Public notes are visible all the time while private notes can be seen by entering the correct password in menu section. 
User can delete or edit Notes whenever they want. 
Also user can add image by using camera after creating notes. 
We are using user's devices' storage to store notes and image so that it is available only in user's device. 

Suggestion: Please remember your password,we don't have any provision to recover passwords.

I am passionate software developer having experience in Mobile application development. Developing mobile applications is my hobby. New frameworks/technologies interests me a lot. \nYour feedback is highly appreciated. \nThank You Very Much
